mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_POST(ID, MEMBER_ID, POST_CONTENT, POST_TITLE, POST_CREATE_AT, POST_MODIFIED_AT, POST_IMAGE1, POST_IMAGE2, POST_IMAGE3, POST_IMAGE4, POST_IMAGE5, POST_COLOR ) VALUES (SEQ_NOTICE.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{postContent}, #{postTitle}, #{postCreateAt}, #{postModifiedAt}, #{postImage1}#{postImage2} #{postImage3} #{postImage4} #{postImage5} #{postColor})
